price: E, com efeito, fizemos no céu, constelações, e aformoseamo-lo, para os olhadores.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jaʿalnā fī al-samāi burūjan wazayyannāhā lilnnāẓirīna
